remarks: Multiplication of two N x N matrices given in maps-to notation. (Contributed by AV, 29-Oct-2019.)
statement:
mpt2matmul.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
mpt2matmul.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
mpt2matmul.m $e |- .X. = ( .r ` A ) $.
mpt2matmul.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
mpt2matmul.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. V ) $.
mpt2matmul.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
mpt2matmul.x $e |- X = ( i e. N , j e. N |-> C ) $.
mpt2matmul.y $e |- Y = ( i e. N , j e. N |-> E ) $.
mpt2matmul.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. N /\ j e. N ) -> C e. B ) $.
mpt2matmul.e $e |- ( ( ph /\ i e. N /\ j e. N ) -> E e. B ) $.
mpt2matmul.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( k = i /\ m = j ) ) -> D = C ) $.
mpt2matmul.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( m = i /\ l = j ) ) -> F = E ) $.
mpt2matmul.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. N /\ m e. N ) -> D e. U ) $.
mpt2matmul.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ m e. N /\ l e. N ) -> F e. W ) $.
mpt2matmul $p |- ( ph -> ( X .X. Y ) = ( k e. N , l e. N |-> ( R gsum ( m e. N |-> ( D .x. F ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .x. k l $.
$d D i j $.
$d F i j $.
$d N i j k l m $.
$d R i j k l m $.
$d X k l m $.
$d Y k l m $.
$d i j k l m ph $.
